Text: Seems like all the MP3 files are defective. Solid monotone beep from beginning to end of every file. Nothing else. Not even voice in the background. Tried several different players.

Yup, me too.  Nothing but a single tone all the way through five chapters.  It all LOOKS like it's legit, but I got a feeling. . . .  

Nice try.  Wanna try again?
